nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE CONDITIONS ABOUT TO SPREAD INTO JAMAICA AS THE EYE OF  BERYL APPROACHES... ...EYE OF BERYL EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY...
summary:
...HURRICANE CONDITIONS ABOUT TO SPREAD INTO JAMAICA AS THE EYE OF  BERYL APPROACHES... ...EYE OF BERYL EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY...
 As of 2:00 PM EDT Wed Jul 3
 the center of Beryl was located near 17.3, -76.9
 with movement WNW at 18 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 959 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.
